name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam saves Jonas from the apocalypse.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: They must use it to break the cycle. Martha and Jonas must travel to the origin world.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: During the Apocalypse, time stands still for a fraction of a second, breaking the chain of cause and effect. For a moment, there is a gap through which reality can proceed in two different directions: a switch at the knot of the time loop.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Old Claudia realized that they're not all part of the knot. They must remove the knot to destroy all that was born on it and keeping everything alive that already existed in the origin world.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam and old Claudia arrive to sic mundus' headquarters.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha meets Adam and tells him that she has fulfilled the mission.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Agnes joins sic mundus again.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Adam gives her the newspaper that shows old claudia's death.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Agnes say goodbye to Silja.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Agnes leaves through the God Particle.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam explains adult Charlotte that in just one day they are going to unravel the knot. He wants to save his world, not Eve's.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Adult charlotte and adult Elisabeth leave through the God Particle to 2041.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha reminds Adam that she has kept her end of the bargain. Now she wants to know what is the origin and how to destroy it.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam reveals to teen Martha that the female stranger didn't send teen Jonas and her to stop the apocalypse. Instead they created the seed: the beginning of the knot, and also its end.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam encloses Martha.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam wants to create a "paradise". Unending darkness in which nothing exists.

name: Silja Tiedemann (J)
description: Silja frees Martha and takes her with Adam.

name: Franziska Doppler (J)
description: Adult Franziska and adult Magnus travel to find Martha.

name: Silja Tiedemann (J)
description: Teen Silja travel to 1890 to meet Bartosz.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam ties Martha up in the former cooling bash. he wants to destroy her and her unborn child, putting an end to both worlds.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam takes the St. Christopher medallion ...

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: ... and activates the machine.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha dies ...

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: ... but nothing happens.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia arrives and explains to Adam that his attempt has failed due to quantum entanglement. Eve found a way to change the course of events, meaning there is a second pregnant Martha out there that will give birth and preserve the knot.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia reveals that the origin doesn't lies in the connection between both worlds but in reality it lies outside both of those worlds.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: There is a third world: the origin world.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Tannhaus, in the origin world, lost someone and he tried to bring them back from the death, but instead, he split and destroyed his world, thus creating both adam and eve worlds.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: There is a way to destroy the knot by preventing the invention of travel through space and time in the origin world.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia has discovered quantum entanglement and the origin world.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia explains adult Jonas his next steps. he have to set the course, no matter how hard it may seem.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia tears the last pages.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas learns from Claudia in the bunker/base of operations.

description: Jonas steals some fuel.

description: Silja breaks teen Jonas out of his cell and demands he show her what's really in the dead zone.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia (Martha's world) asks adult Claudia (Jonas' world) to join the light side (Eve) instead of the shadow side (Adam).

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description:
She explains the meaning of the three cycles:

- teen Jonas opened the passage in 2020
- adult Jonas had previously shut in 2019
- the passage was opened in summer 1986 for the first time

in all three moments, they left behind traces of cesium residue. In every cycle, at each of these three moments, the cesium is carried throught the tunnel and back before it's completely decayed.

It exponentially expands endlessly, so it creates the passage.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Everything has to happen again. They must keep the loop.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult claudia (Martha's world) gives adult Claudia (Jonas' world) the notebook and explains that she need lead everybody along the same path. She need the mantain the knot.

description: Adult Claudia uses her time machine.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia reads the notebook.

name: Peter Doppler (J)
description: Adult Peter surprises him. A fight ensues and Peter is killed.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Teen Elisabeth manages to free herself and kills the burglar with a fire extinguisher.

description: Adult Claudia goes to the power plant and sees the god particle.

description: Jonas appears. He is trying to figure out a way for the god particle to work.

description: Teen Elisabeth and teen Noah discover the door that reads "Sic mundus creatus est", but the time travel is closed.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Teen Noah consoles teen Elisabeth by talking about the paradise promised by Adam.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas and adult Claudia  try to make the god particle work without success.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas can't take it anymore and tries to hang himself.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Noah saves him and reminds him that he cannot die because his future version already exists. This is the start of a friendship between them.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Noah tells him that they have found the passage and reminds him that he must keep his promise.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adult Jonas, adult Noah, and old Claudia work on stabilizing the time travel portal.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adult jonas tells that he changed the component in the passage and he thinks this time will be different.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: They spend decades working on the project, leading Noah to doubt Claudia's efforts. He believes she is sabotaging her own work.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (M)
description: Old claudia (Martha's world) reminds old Claudia (Jonas' world), that she must guide Jonas on his path.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (M)
description: Old claudia (Jonas' world) remembers what her older version said:  "If all of this works, our Regina will live." Then, why does she need to suffer endlessly?

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia (Jonas' world), doesn't trust Eve anymore and kills old Claudia (Martha's world).

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia (Jonas' world) steals old Claudia's (Martha's world) time machine and impersonates her identity.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Adult Charlotte and adult Elisabeth arrive to 2041.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: They take little Charlotte to bring her to H.G. Tannhaus.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah and adult Elisabeth realize that Charlotte has disappeared.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah threatens adult Jonas but he doesn't know where Charlotte is.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Noah grabs the notebook and vows to find Charlotte.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: After decades of failed attempts, adult Jonas and old Claudia succeed in building a time travel portal in the ruins of the power plant.
An explosion at the power plant causes the leak of radioactive material.

name: Bernd Doppler (J)
description: Old Bernd covers it up and puts the resulting radioactive waste in yellow barrels hidden in a cave.
The explosion opens the portal in the passage.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah and adult Helge start kidnapping children in order to test the chair machine.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Young Katharina and young Ulrich bind young Regina to a tree.

name: Mads Nielsen (J)
description: Mads accompanies Regina to her house and gets lost in the woods.

name: Mads Nielsen (J)
description: Mads Nielsen goes missing.

name: Mads Nielsen (J)
description: Mad's attempt to travel with Noah's machine.

name: Erik Obendorf (J)
description: Erik is transported to 1953 through the chair, but dies in the process.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Claudia is given Tannhaus's book about time travel by Helge.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: It is Claudia's first day running the power plant.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Bernd shows adult Claudia the radioactive waste in the caves.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: A shepherd shows Egon 33 dead sheep. It seems that now he is a believer, because a new priest has come to Winden.

name: Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Mikkel travels throught the caves to 1986.

name: Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Mikkel goes to the police and Egon takes him to the hospital

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia confronts old Bernd about the summer's accident.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Teen Hannah accuses Ulrich of raping Katharina.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Ulrich is arrested on charges of raping Katharina.

name: Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Noah visits Mikkel at the hospital.

name: Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Child Mikkel/Michael and teen Hannah formally meet at the hospital.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: The stranger arrives from 2019 to visit old H.G. Tannhaus and asks him to fix the machine so he can destroy the wormhole.

name: Yasin Friese (J)
description: Yasin is transported to 1953 through the chair, but dies in the process.

name: Yasin Friese (J)
description: Yasin Friese disappears in the woods.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Young Jonas arrives from 2019.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon questions teen Katharina.

name: Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Ines adopts child Mikkel/Michael.

name: Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Young Jonas finds Mikkel at the hospital.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jona encounters his older self, who tells him no to interfere.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas goes back to 2019.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Egon writes on his police notebook that Helge drove down the long way on the night Mads goes missing.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: H.G. Tannhaus teaches the stranger about time travel.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Teen Hannah tells Teen Katharina that Teen Regina was the false witness to the rape.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Teen Ulrich is released from prison.

name: Aleksander Tiedemann / Boris Niewald (J)
description: Teen Aleksander rescues teen Regina from teen Katharina and teen Ulrich.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia hires Teen Aleksander to weld the door between the power plant and the caves shut.

name: Aleksander Tiedemann / Boris Niewald (J)
description: Teen Boris Niewald arrives in Winden and adopts the identity of Aleksander Köhler.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Hannah found the hidden bag of Boris with the gun and the fake passport.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Hannah blackmails Aleksander Tiedemann since she has proof he is an imposter.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Elder Helge arrives from 2019.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Elder Helge tries to stop adult Helge but he runs away.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Claudia finds Gretchen on the caves.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Old Helge attempts to kill adult Helge in a car accident, but adult Helge survives and Old Helge dies.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Adult Helge goes to the psychiatric hospital.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adult Jonas returns to Old H.G. Tannhaus' shop and picks up the finished time machine.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas arrives from 2019.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas goes to the hospital but is stopped by Noah and adult Helge.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas wakes up in the bunker and his future self reveals his true identity.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adult Jonas fails to destroy the passage but he succeeds in closing it.
The time portal opens over Winden.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas touches little Helge through the portal and travels to 2052.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Child Helge arrives to 1986 through the wormhole after touching Jonas.
The time portal opens over Winden.
The time portal opens over Winden.
The time portal opens over Winden.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: The stranger extracts a bit of substance from the radioactive waste in the truck.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia visits Adult Claudia at her office at the power plant and reveals her identity.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia shows Adult Claudia the time machine in the caves and tells her she must stop Adam.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon visits adult Helge in the psychiatric hospital and asks him about Mads' disappearncet.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon first visits old Ulrich in the psych ward.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia digs up the time machine that old Claudia had buried for her.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia visits Old H.G. Tannhaus and he explains that A Journey Through Time traveled to him from the future before he wrote it.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon visits adult Claudia at her office and tells her he has prostate cancer.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia travels to 2020.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon returns to old Ulrich and shows him Mikkel/Michael's photo.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah successfully transports child Helge to 1954 through the chair.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia arrives from 1987 and learns adult Regina has cancer.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia goes to the library and researches her family, discovering Egon's impending death.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia leaves to return to 1987.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia returns from 2020.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia asks old Egon to move in with her in the hopes of avoiding his death.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Old Ulrich breaks out of the psychiatric hospital and finds Mikkel/Michael.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon and the police stop old Ulrich from taking Mikkel/Michael.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Old Ulrich sees the kids from inside the police car but is unable to make contact.

name: Magnus Nielsen (J)
description: Teen Magnus, teen Franziska, teen Martha, teen Bartosz, and child Elisabeth arrive from 2020.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Old Ulrich goes to the psych ward.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Egon wants to have the police search the caves, but adult Claudia refuses.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: When old Egon doesn't listen, they fight and he falls and hits his head.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia decides to let old Egon die, thinking this is the sacrifice she needs to make to save Regina.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas, after spending a year learning from old Claudia, arrives at adult Claudia's house and says she must come with him immediately.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas brings adult Claudia to take an isotope from the waste in the caves.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas and adult Claudia use the time machine and reopen the passage.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas and adult Claudia leave for 2020.

name: Unknown
description: The unknown break in Sic Mundus headquarters. they steal blueprints for the time machine before setting the room on fire.

name: Unknown
description: Unknown trio kill Bernd Doppler to get the power plant's master key.

name: Unknown
description: Unknown trio kill Claudia's secretary to get the power plant's blueprints.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina asks in the police station about Mikkel and they tell her that they took him to another place after an old man tried to take him again.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina meets her mother, Helene Albers, at the pysch ward and ask her to visit the old man.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina convinces Helene because Helene recognizes the Saint Christopher pendant.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina meets old Ulrich and tell him that she is going to help him to escape.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina rests in the Kahnwald's house. Adult Ines and Mikkel have been missing for 3 months.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina visits the school looking for Mikkel. She meets teen Ulrich, teen Katharina and teen Hannah.

name: Jana Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Jana is upset with adult Tronte because she knows that he was with Claudia the day that Mads went missing.

name: Tronte Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Tronte asks for Claudia at the power plant. Her secretary says Claudia looked weird a few days before her disappearance.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina plans to steal the psych ward's keys from her mother and asks Ulrich to wait for her.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Katharina follow her mother and tries to steal the psych ward's keys.

name: Katharina Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Helene kills adult Katharina on the lake shore.
The Saint Christopher pendant get lost in the sand.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Poor Ulrich stays alone in the psych ward.

name: Ines Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Ines and teen Michael come back to home.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Old H.G. Tannhaus shows to teen Charlotte a photo of his son, his son's wife and his granddaughter.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: They had an accident and his son and his wife died. His granddaughter's body never appeared.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: That day, two women handed H.G. Tannhaus a little Charlotte. She only carried a pocket watch with her name.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Teen Peter arrives to Winden and teen Charlotte meets him.
Plans to build the power plant begin.

name: Erik Obendorf (J)
description: Erik's corpse appears in the bunker from 1986.

name: Yasin Friese (J)
description: The bodies of Erik and Yasin are found buried in a pile of sand in the nuclear plant.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Adult Helge disposes of Yasin's body.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Ulrich visits H.G. Tannhaus. child Jana and child Ines appear in the shop and talk about the bodies.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Ulrich arrives from 2019.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Ulrich met his grandmother Agnes and his father Tronte.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Agnes and Tronte arrive to Winden.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Agnes and Tronte meet the Tiedemann's.

name: Tronte Nielsen (J)
description: Child Claudia teaches the town to Tronte. Helge accompanies them.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Child Helge puts Gretchen in the cave.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Ulrich leaves his phone at Adult H.G. Tannhaus' shop.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Ulrich visits the police station and finds out that the little boy is Helge.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Ulrich tries to kill little Helge so that he could prevent all the kids' murders.

name: Ulrich Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Ulrich is arrested by adult Egon for Yasin and Erik's murders and the suspected murder of child Helge.

name: Helge Doppler (J)
description: Helge wakes up in the bunker.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Charlotte finds a 1953 newspaper article with a mugshot of Ulrich.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Claudia Tiedemann visits adult H.G. Tannhaus and asks him to build the time machine.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Child Helge goes to 1986 through the wormhole after touching Jonas.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah arrives from 1921.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Agnes and Doris become lovers.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Daniel encourages Egon to have an affair.

name: Greta Doppler (J)
description: Greta asks adult Noah to help with child Helge and gets him to speak.

name: Greta Doppler (J)
description: Child Helge returns home.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Agnes tells adult Noah that old Claudia has the missing Triquetra pages on her.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah kills old Claudia.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah looks at the pages old Claudia had on her and gets upset by what he learns about Charlotte.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia visits adult H.G. Tannhaus, gives him A Journey Through Time and tells him to explain the machine to her one day.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia buries the time machine in the future yard of adult Claudia.

name: Agnes Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Agnes meets old Claudia in the bunker and receives instructions to give the obituary to younger Claudia.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Egon shows Helge a photo of old Claudia and he says she is the white devil.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Hannah and adult Egon flirt.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah arrives from 2020 and goes to adult Egon's office to try and find adult Ulrich.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah asks adult Ulrich to choose between her and Katharina at the psychiatric hospital.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah abandons adult Ulrich.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Egon have an affair with adult Hannah. he gives her the Saint Christopher pendant.

name: Doris Tiedemann (J)
description: Doris is worried about Agnes' disappearance.

name: Doris Tiedemann (J)
description: Doris finds a small handkerchief in the laundry with the H.T. initials. Hanno Tauber, the priest who disappeared with Agnes.

name: Greta Doppler (J)
description: Adult Greta asks adult Egon to find Hanno Tauber.

name: Doris Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Doris goes to the church and meets the unknown man. She asks them about Agnes and he insinuates that her husband is cheating on her.

name: Tronte Nielsen (J)
description: Unknown man meets teen Tronte. He knows him and his mother. Actually the unknown man chose his name, Tronte.

name: Tronte Nielsen (J)
description: The unknown man gives teen Tronte a bracelet that belonged to his mother.

name: Tronte Nielsen (J)
description: Teen Jana and teen Tronte make friends and he gifts her the bracelet.

name: Unknown
description: The unknown trio ambushed Winden's mayor and force him to sign the license to build the nuclear power plant.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah finds out she's pregnant.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah tells Egon that she is pregnant and decides to abort. Egon recommends Dr. Obendorf.

name: Egon Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Doris and adult Egon break up and Egon goes into depression.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Hannah meets a young Helene Albers and they become friends.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah decides not to abort and gives young Helene the Saint Christopher pendant.

name: Hannah Kahnwald (J)
description: Adult Hannah uses the time machine and leaves for 1888.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Adult Elisabeth and adult Charlotte arrive to 1971.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Adult Elisabeth and adult Charlotte show up at the Tannhaus door and hand him little Charlotte.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Marek argue with his father H.G. Tannhaus because he doesn't pay him enough attention.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and their daughter Charlotte take the car although it's raining.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: As his son, daughter-in-law and granddaughter die in the car accident, Tannhaus treats the baby as his granddaughter Charlotte.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little Charlotte die in a car accident.
